#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>

using namespace std;

#define ll long long int

ll minmv=1000000000;

int main()
{
  ll n,i,no_of_subsets=0,j,prd;
  scanf("%lld",&n);

  ll k[n];

   for(i=0;i<n;i++)
   {
      scanf("%lld",&k[i]);
   }

   no_of_subsets=pow(2,n);

   for(i=0;i< no_of_subsets;i++)
   {
     prd=1;
     for(j=0;j<n;j++)
     {
       if(i&(1<<j))
       prd=prd*k[j];

       if(prd<minmv)
       minmv=prd;

     }
   }

   printf("%lld\n",minmv);

   return 0;
}
